attributes.action: remove diane abbot from the goverment
attributes.additional_details: remove diane abbott from her job as an mp,shes not worthy and did not vote or represent her constituents or party
attributes.background: diane abbot recently decided not to vote on trigering article 50,instead she thaught to do a sickie,a bitrayal to her constituents and her party,there were others there that didnt feel well but stayed and did vote,time for her to leave polotics shes a disgrace

rejection.details:
In any case, Diane Abbott is not a member of the Government. 

You can find out which MPs are in the Government here:

http://www.parliament.uk/mps-lords-and-offices/government-and-opposition1/
